job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Title: Software Engineer Location: Sunnyvale, California Job Description: As a Software Engineer in the Engineering Department, your primary responsibilities will include working side by side with R&D and 3rd party vender on the development of new automated test equipment. You will be expected to demonstrated an excellent working knowledge of C/C# programming, developing application and automating tool per product required. You are a self-motivated professional who demonstrates the ability to quickly grasp new technologies, products and use cases. Responsibilities will include: Participate in product functional, system architecture and design review. Collaborate effectively with peers and venders to solve complex problems, deliver end-to-end quality in our product and customer experience. Triage customer issues and find timely creative solution to customer problems. Execute test cases, analyze and report test results to internal R&D or venders. Write API and feature documentation. Required qualifications: BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience. 2+ year’ working experience on Windows/Linux SW development with strong debugging skills. Have strong programming skills on C#, Java, Python, etc. Knowledge of cloud-based services or imaging process will be preferred. Strong collaboration and communication skills. Strong initiative and ability to work independently.
